metadata.title: CVE-2023-38289 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** Not a Security Issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38289` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm12
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm12
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm12
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm12
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm12').
